item.title: RT Brace: Don't have access to the Mistral API yet? No need to worry. @LangChainAI 🦜🔗 TS v0.0.208 supports the @togethercompute API, with Mistra...
item.description:
RT Brace
Don't have access to the Mistral API yet? No need to worry. @LangChainAI 🦜🔗 TS v0.0.208 supports the @togethercompute API, with Mistral 8x7b in general availability!

See the docs for how to start using the API now:

https://js.langchain.com/docs/integrations/llms/togetherai


Brace: 🧙 Mistral AI API Integration 🧙

@LangChainAI 🔗🦜 just added a package for interacting with the @MistralAI chat, streaming and embedding endpoints, all seamlessly integrated with LangChain's ecosystem.

Download the package here:

https://www.npmjs.com/package/@langchain/mistralai

Read the docs here:… https://twitter.com/i/web/status/1735376742108545433
item.author: LangChain

item.title: RT Harpreet Sahota 👨🏽‍💻 🥑: I'm the kind of guy who doesn't settle for benchmarks – I roll up my sleeves and dive headfirst into the acti...
item.description:
RT Harpreet Sahota 👨🏽‍💻 🥑
I'm the kind of guy who doesn't settle for benchmarks – I roll up my sleeves and dive headfirst into the action.

Benchmarks are great but hard to grasp and wrap my head around; I need to feel how a model works and go through the motions to believe it.

It's how I grok things.… https://twitter.com/i/web/status/1735723440643117387
item.author: LangChain

item.title: 🔎Proposition-Based Retrieval This new paper by @tomchen0 introduces a new retrieval method by changing 🎯what is indexed🎯 in the first place T...
item.description:
🔎Proposition-Based Retrieval

This new paper by @tomchen0 introduces a new retrieval method by changing 🎯what is indexed🎯 in the first place

This can easily use our 🌲multi-vector retriever🌲, and we've added a template to get started with it easily!

💡How does it work? 👇… https://twitter.com/i/web/status/1735708004618764470

item.title: RT Prediction Guard: Re 📚 Challenge 2 - Creative Storytelling - Develop a chatbot that helps tell a compelling story. Samy Gauquelin used the lates...
item.description:
RT Prediction Guard
Re 📚 Challenge 2 - Creative Storytelling - Develop a chatbot that helps tell a compelling story.

Samy Gauquelin used the latest Neural-Chat model from @intel (available in @predictionguard) and @LangChainAI to create a story generating agent!!

Full Recap: https://community.intel.com/t5/Blogs/Tech-Innovation/Artificial-Intelligence-AI/Advent-of-GenAI-Hackathon-Recap-of-Challenge-2/post/1552264

item.title: RT Ryuu: Exciting news! 🚀 Just launched my Personal Tutoring Bot 🤖📚 - Upload files, ask questions, get predictions for the next one, get quiz...
item.description:
RT Ryuu
Exciting news! 🚀 Just launched my Personal Tutoring Bot 🤖📚 - Upload files, ask questions, get predictions for the next one, get quizzes based on your files, Gives top topics and its details asked by all users. 🎓 Currently used by 30+ students at our college! 🌐✨ #EdTech #AI

item.title: RT Colin McNamara: Come hack on @langchainAI with us tonight!
item.description:
RT Colin McNamara
Come hack on @langchainAI with us tonight!


Austin LangChain: 🚀 Join us at #AustinLangChain Meetup on Dec 14! Dive into AI Web Architecture with #LangChain, #Streamlit, & #Docker.
📍1204 San Antonio, Austin, TX.
⏰6-9 PM.
🔗 https://www.meetup.com/austin-langchain-ai-group/events/297837958/
#AI #WebDevelopment #AustinTech
👇 More details in the thread!

item.description:
RT AI Makerspace
🧑‍💻⚒️ Have you built with LangSmith yet?

It’s @LangChainAI's emerging best-practice #LLM Ops tool for deploying & operating LLM applications in production!

🤩Join us at 10 AM PT next week to talk LangSmith: How to Improve LLM Apps in #production.

https://lu.ma/Langsmithllmapps
